title: Data Management for Data Science
description: Principles of data management, relational data model, relational algebra, SQL for data science, NoSQL databases (document, key-value, graph, column-family), multidimensional data management (data warehousing, OLAP Queries, OLAP Cubes, visualizing multidimensional data). Prerequisites: none. Restricted to students within the DS75 and DS76 major.
